resources.string: Enjoy a brand-new experience of using an alarm clock!
Click on the clock icon to set up an alarm
A must-have for you to start your busy day
Play any of these mini games to refresh your brain whenever you want
Click here to open the Navigation menu
Quick access to any sections of the app
A "How to play" Section will be in the menu for each game
We are going to guide you to allow alarm permissions in a few steps
Enjoy your time of using Brain Boost! \n Click the "skip" button on the top to go to the next page for alarm permissions
